author: svn-role
msg: Remove the '1.7.x-issue4428' branch, merged in r1538137.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix issues #4428 and #4429: external references a redirected HTTP-URL.
In handle_external_item_change(), a redirect was effectively ignored by
passing the old URL to switch_dir_external(). Pass the new one.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix issue #4425 and #3014 on Windows: svn.exe crashed when output of 'log'
* fixed: command line client crashes when piped command is interrupted on

author: svn-role
msg: Fix an of-by-one error in the fspath calculations of libsvn_ra_local,
for the specific case where a repository is placed in a Windows drive
Improves correctness. Resolves user reported problem.
